name: Les Passagers du Vent
overview: The Passengers of the Wind is a series of historical comics, by François Bourgeon. Passengers of the Wind was adapted into a video game by Infogrames in 1986 on many platforms (Amstrad CPC, PC, Commodore 64, Atari ST, Thomson MO/TO, Amiga, MSX 2) under the title The Passengers of the Wind
